ratings.notes: [proposed_contextual_controlled] Here at Harbor Market<TAB>5<TAB>4<TAB>3<TAB>4<TAB>Short note: Response shows context relevance and naturalness but lacks persona consistency in tone, suggesting a more personalized approach.

baseline_no_context_phi3_latest<TAB>2<TAB>5<TAB>4<TAB>3<TAB>The merchant's tone is consistent with his persona, but he could have been more direct about the scarcity of potions and less apologetic for not offering a discount. The response maintains naturalness despite being slightly out-of-character in terms of directly addressing player demands.
